parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns combined array including all unit's stored [[items]] and all unit's stored [[magazines]] and all unit's '''stored''' [[weapons]]. Loaded magazines such as [[currentMagazine]], [[primaryWeaponMagazine]], [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]], [[handgunMagazine]], [[binocularMagazine]] as well as [[assignedItems]] are excluded. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''itemsWithMagazines''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[itemsWithMagazines]] [[player]]
//is essentially the same as
[[items]] [[player]] + [[magazines]] [[player]]</code>

<code>[
	"FirstAidKit",			//item
	"30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag",	//magazine
	"16Rnd_9x21_Mag",		//magazine
	"Chemlight_green",		//magazine
	"HandGrenade",			//magazine
	"ToolKit",			//item
	"MineDetector"			//item
]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[items]], [[removeAllItemsWithMagazines]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
